thread.title: Shutterfly to Buy School Photos Provider Lifetouch for $825 Million

author: Adrienne Roberts
title: Shutterfly to Buy School Photos Provider Lifetouch for $825 Million
text:
Shutterfly Inc. said Tuesday it will acquire the privately held photography company Lifetouch Inc. for $825 million in cash, deepening its presence in the school-photos market and expanding its reach among potential customers of its online platform.
Shutterfly shares, which had gained 3.4% over the past year, jumped 17% in after-hours trading.
